Construct a tbl_genome using tribble formatting.

Construct a tbl_genome using tribble formatting.

trbl_genome(...)

Arguments

...

for tibble::tribble()

Value

tbl_genome()

Examples

trbl_genome(
  ~chrom, ~size,
  'chr1', 1e6
)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>   chrom  size
#>   <chr> <dbl>
#> 1  chr1 1e+06
